verses.verse: A soft <S%H7390><s%> answer <S%H4617><s%> turneth away <S%H7725><s%> wrath: <S%H2534><s%> but grievous <S%H6089><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> stir up <S%H5927><s%> anger. <S%H639><s%>

The tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> useth knowledge <S%H1847><s%> aright: <S%H3190><s%> but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> poureth out <S%H5042><s%> foolishness. <S%H200><s%>
The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> are in every <S%H3605><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> beholding <S%H6822><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> and the good. <S%H2896><s%>
A wholesome <S%H4832><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> is a tree <S%H6086><s%> of life: <S%H2416><s%> but perverseness <S%H5558><s%> therein is a breach <S%H7667><s%> in the spirit. <S%H7307><s%>
A fool <S%H191><s%> despiseth <S%H5006><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> instruction: <S%H4148><s%> but he that regardeth <S%H8104><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%> is prudent. <S%H6191><s%>
In the house <S%H1004><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is much <S%H7227><s%> treasure: <S%H2633><s%> but in the revenues <S%H8393><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is trouble. <S%H5916><s%>
The lips <S%H8193><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> disperse <S%H2219><s%> knowledge: <S%H1847><s%> but the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the foolish <S%H3684><s%> doeth not <S%H3808><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%>

The sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> but the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> is his delight. <S%H7522><s%>

The way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> but he loveth <S%H157><s%> him that followeth after <S%H7291><s%> righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
Correction <S%H4148><s%> is grievous <S%H7451><s%> unto him that forsaketh <S%H5800><s%> the way: <S%H734><s%> and he that hateth <S%H8130><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%> shall die. <S%H4191><s%>

Hell <S%H7585><s%> and destruction <S%H11><s%> are before <S%H5048><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> how much more then <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> the hearts <S%H3826><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of men? <S%H120><s%>
A scorner <S%H3887><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> one that reproveth <S%H3198><s%> him: neither <S%H3808><s%> will he go <S%H1980><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the wise. <S%H2450><s%>

A merry <S%H8056><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> maketh a cheerful <S%H3190><s%> countenance: <S%H6440><s%> but by sorrow <S%H6094><s%> of the heart <S%H3820><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> is broken. <S%H5218><s%>

The heart <S%H3820><s%> of him that hath understanding <S%H995><s%> seeketh <S%H1245><s%> knowledge: <S%H1847><s%> but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of fools <S%H3684><s%> feedeth on <S%H7462><s%> foolishness. <S%H200><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> are evil: <S%H7451><s%> but he that is of a merry <S%H2896><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> hath a continual <S%H8548><s%> feast. <S%H4960><s%>
Better <S%H2896><s%> is little <S%H4592><s%> with the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> than great <S%H7227><s%> treasure <S%H4480><s%> <S%H214><s%> and trouble <S%H4103><s%> therewith.

Better <S%H2896><s%> is a dinner <S%H737><s%> of herbs <S%H3419><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> love <S%H160><s%> is, than a stalled <S%H75><s%> ox <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7794><s%> and hatred <S%H8135><s%> therewith.
A wrathful <S%H2534><s%> man <S%H376><s%> stirreth up <S%H1624><s%> strife: <S%H4066><s%> but he that is slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%> appeaseth <S%H8252><s%> strife. <S%H7379><s%>
The way <S%H1870><s%> of the slothful <S%H6102><s%> man is as a hedge <S%H4881><s%> of thorns: <S%H2312><s%> but the way <S%H734><s%> of the righteous <S%H3477><s%> is made plain. <S%H5549><s%>
A wise <S%H2450><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> maketh a glad <S%H8055><s%> father: <S%H1><s%> but a foolish <S%H3684><s%> man <S%H120><s%> despiseth <S%H959><s%> his mother. <S%H517><s%>

Folly <S%H200><s%> is joy <S%H8057><s%> to him that is destitute <S%H2638><s%> of wisdom: <S%H3820><s%> but a man <S%H376><s%> of understanding <S%H8394><s%> walketh <S%H1980><s%> uprightly. <S%H3474><s%>
Without <S%H369><s%> counsel <S%H5475><s%> purposes <S%H4284><s%> are disappointed: <S%H6565><s%> but in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of counselors <S%H3289><s%> they are established. <S%H6965><s%>

A man <S%H376><s%> hath joy <S%H8057><s%> by the answer <S%H4617><s%> of his mouth: <S%H6310><s%> and a word <S%H1697><s%> spoken in due season, <S%H6256><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> is it!

The way <S%H734><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> is above <S%H4605><s%> to the wise, <S%H7919><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> he may depart <S%H5493><s%> from hell <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7585><s%> beneath. <S%H4295><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will destroy <S%H5255><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the proud: <S%H1343><s%> but he will establish <S%H5324><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of the widow. <S%H490><s%>

The thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of the wicked <S%H7451><s%> are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> but the words of the pure <S%H2889><s%> are pleasant <S%H5278><s%> words. <S%H561><s%>
He that is greedy <S%H1214><s%> of gain <S%H1215><s%> troubleth <S%H5916><s%> his own house; <S%H1004><s%> but he that hateth <S%H8130><s%> gifts <S%H4979><s%> shall live. <S%H2421><s%>

The heart <S%H3820><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> studieth <S%H1897><s%> to answer: <S%H6030><s%> but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> poureth out <S%H5042><s%> evil things. <S%H7451><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is far <S%H7350><s%> from the wicked: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7563><s%> but he heareth <S%H8085><s%> the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
The light <S%H3974><s%> of the eyes <S%H5869><s%> rejoiceth <S%H8055><s%> the heart: <S%H3820><s%> and a good <S%H2896><s%> report <S%H8052><s%> maketh the bones <S%H6106><s%> fat. <S%H1878><s%>
The ear <S%H241><s%> that heareth <S%H8085><s%> the reproof <S%H8433><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> abideth <S%H3885><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the wise. <S%H2450><s%>

He that refuseth <S%H6544><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%> despiseth <S%H3988><s%> his own soul: <S%H5315><s%> but he that heareth <S%H8085><s%> reproof <S%H8433><s%> getteth <S%H7069><s%> understanding. <S%H3820><s%>
The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is the instruction <S%H4148><s%> of wisdom; <S%H2451><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> honor <S%H3519><s%> is humility. <S%H6038><s%>
